scripts.build:client: parcel build lib/client/index.js --no-minify --no-source-maps -t node --bundle-node-modules --out-dir ./ -o client.js && sed -i '' '1s;^;var ;' ./client.js && parcel build lib/client/index.js --no-source-maps -t node --bundle-node-modules --out-dir ./ -o client.min.js && sed -i '' '1s;^;var ;' ./client.min.js
